name: Humi Holdings Corp.
description: Developer of cloud-based software designed to automate human resources processes. The company's software facilitates employee recruiting and onboarding, time-off tracking, scheduling, payroll management, benefits administration, as well as performance monitoring and reporting, enabling businesses to simplify and modernize human resource management.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based software designed to automate human resources processes. The company's software facilitates employee recruiting and onboarding, time-off tracking, scheduling, payroll management, benefits administration, as well as performance monitoring and reporting, enabling businesses to simplify and modernize human resource management.
